article.headline: Ark.-Pine Bluff 70, Prairie View 67
article.story: PRAIRIE VIEW, Texas (AP) -- William Byrd and Terrance Calvin each scored 17 points to help lead Arkansas-Pine Bluff to a 70-67 victory over Prairie View on Monday night. Byrd hit 7-of-14 from the field and 3-of-6 from the free-throw line. He also had nine rebounds, five blocked shots and two steals. Calvin hit 6-of-11 from the field and all but one of his six free throws. UAPB (9-18, 7-8 Southwestern Athletic) took the lead for good with 23 seconds left in the first half on a free throw by Marcelle Goins. The Golden Lions led 28-27 at the half and pulled out to a 15 point lead with 12:09 left. UAPB made its last field goal with 6:30 left in the game to take a 60-52 lead. Derek Johnson and Jacolby Satterwhite led Prairie View (6-20, 4-10) with 13 points each. Clifford Franks added 12 and Chris Gaines scored 10. The Panthers got 38 points from their bench. Dominique Sharpe hit a field goal with three seconds left for Prairie View's final field goal. UAPB shot 51 percent from the field to 37 percent for Prairie View.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
